short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your Chrome tab into an animal shelter and help Kurt the Koala recover from the wildfires.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take care of Kurt the Koala with every tab you open. Rebuild his home and buy nice decoration and accessories. By doing so, you instantly donate money to WWF.
Install the extension and we already donate 3 euros in your name.
The cosier your animal shelter gets, the more you support WWF.
